title: Nieve roja
overview: The story takes place in a secret, state-of-the-art base in Antarctica, where seven strangers were selected by a billionaire tycoon to participate in a program that aims to determine who of them is the most suitable to win a position in the company. However, the candidates' stay begins to get complicated when they disappear one by one under mysterious circumstances, which will test the trust between them, while they are isolated and monitored by a rigorous artificial intelligence system called AGATHA.
